name: Celbugs
description:
Welcome to Celbug Island!

You've just awoken on an island home to colourful, cubic critters known as Celbugs. The Celbugs are in grave danger: square-shaped Gnats, born from human pollution, are preying on them. It's down to you to amass an army of Celbugs and help return their species to its former glory!

Gameplay


- Breed Celbugs together, creating offspring that inherits from both parents
- Take your Celbugs into 25 different Bug Battles, and destroy Gnats with unique abilities
- Appease the Celbug God to upgrade your in-battle hand, and unlock more Bug Battles
